mapper.insert:
insert into t_trade_statistics_detail (code,time,capital_out,capital_in,capital_net) values
(#{item.code},#{item.time},#{item.capitalOut}, #{item.capitalIn}, #{item.capitalNet} )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE capital_out = values(capital_out), capital_in = values(capital_in), capital_net = values(capital_net)
